description: pot +‎ hunter – in hunting sense, “for the (cooking) pot (to eat)”; in the archeology sense, “seeking old pots (to sell)”.

entries.meaning: A person who hunts animals for food (for the pot) rather than as sport.
(sports, by extension) A person who competes solely to win prizes.
(archaeology) A person who seeks artifacts for their personal collection or to sell without regard to their cultural importance.
